channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: I don't think it has much to do with how many bots are using Twitter, or whether Democrats are assholes. I think what really matters is what's happening to Tesla stock, and with it, Musk's wealth. https://t.co/TT5wtHzwaJ
Emails Show Ginni Thomas Lobbied State Lawmakers To Subvert Election. https://t.co/hw5VK8ApXt
@nakedjen yes to all the above. it's so fucked.
@waze thanks. glad you like it. ;-)
Wayne Ma: Why Apple's prototype headset has 14 cameras. https://t.co/K1vgQNyB5z
Thatâ€™s right, ideas from old products are out there serving as a foundation. https://t.co/j6AiEBYzt5
@0xgaut Like a Waze for coffee.
@markzip Thank you for clarifying. ðŸ¤ª

Taylor is a very unusual professional reporter in that she criticizes journalists for not serving their readers. She writes about journalism the way a blogger would, that's probably because she started as one. Hat's off to the WP for hiring her. https://t.co/kr3BoX1KnC

1/4 I just want to get some music from my local hard drive to my iPhone. Using Big Sur. Everything I try results in a message saying it couldn't find some song so it aborted the sync.
2/4 Obviously it has an idea of where my music is, but it isn't where my music is.
3/4 Why doesn't Apple have a simple howto doc that they have teste thoroughly that answers the questions raised by the terminology they use in their software.
4/4 Their instructions are amateurish and clearly were not in any way user-tested.
@jeffjarvis @atrupar it's not a scientific thing. in fact it probably just reflects whether Wolf Blitzer and Maggie Haberman like him or don't.

@phonetonote I have the same question that Robert has. My Dropbox files are not public, so how can you generate a link to the files? I think perhaps I'm missing what a link means. I have a #TFT app btw, Drummer -- so I'm always interested in tools that can be hooked into it.
Oh geez Iâ€™m playing Wordless again. Wordle 335 4/6 â¬œðŸŸ¨â¬œâ¬œâ¬œ â¬œâ¬œâ¬œâ¬œâ¬œ ðŸŸ¨ðŸŸ©â¬œðŸŸ©ðŸŸ© ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©
Long COVID is crashing the retirement hopes of many Americans. https://t.co/3PpQ5RjNwU
SpaceX Paid $250,000 to a Flight Attendant Who Accused Elon Musk of Sexual Misconduct. https://t.co/gbombkRMBG
@wgrosso Good point.
Professor Zeynep Tufekci to Assume Role as Inaugural Director of the "Craig Newmark" Center for Journalism Ethics and Security. https://t.co/U497pmuO9h
I don't get where people who are selling their stock are putting the proceeds. Anything that's "safe" will be subject to inflation.

World domination is definitely at stake, now, in the fight between the Repubs and everyone else. https://t.co/eP1M1Ew3y1
The news has to do more than report the upcoming elections as democracy-decisive, they should be connecting the elections to Russia, China, Ukraine, NATO, all of it.
The US is far from isolated, we are being controlled by outside powers, through both parties, probably, but most visibly through the Repubs.
If the election system were a network we would have had to shut it down to close all the back doors that the Repubs are now taking advantage of.
But you have to think of the Repubs as a global power, rich people trying to achieve world domination. How America is governed is a big part of the coup but it's not the whole thing.

@anildash @fastly @glitch Congrats Anil! Glitch is a great ground-breaking product. I hope it continues to evolve in its new home.
Glitch acquired by cloud service provider Fastly. https://t.co/A5dpLv6FTm
Actually a troll gets you to RT what he writes. So I'm the idiot. I take back what I said about him being an idiot. I don't know or care what he is. Have a nice day. :-)

@jeffjarvis he's a fucking idiot. i take back everything i said about him being smart. some things aren't on spectrums. whether or not you steal my medicare and social security is not something you can be moderate on! fool. abortion doesn't have a "moderate" position.
